argument.name: ranges
argument.description: CRLF delimited list of named ranges definitions of the form "name=range".

return.name: result
return.description: Returns true if range was added.

page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" ? gs.AddNamedRanges(<<%str% LEADERBOARD=scoreboard!A1:A10 PRODUCT_IDS=products!A1:Z1 %str%)
